phases.name: Core App & Data Layer
phases.summary: Prisma schema, DB connectivity, and health checks ready for staging.
tasksRemaining: Normalize .env.local (single DATABASE_URL, single NEXTAUTH_SECRET, remove duplicates)
Run prisma generate and db push against staging database
Run db seed if desired for baseline data
Verify /api/health?check=database&detailed=true returns status=healthy

phases.name: UI/UX, Navigation & Pages
phases.summary: All core pages upgraded with standardized components and Matrix theming.
tasksRemaining: Manual QA of core routes: /, /ai, /upload, /dm, /posterize, /mainframe, /settings, /library, /marketplace, /social, /battles
Fix any navigation errors, 404s, or layout glitches found during QA
Ensure standardized headers, loading, and error components are used consistently
Verify no React/Next runtime errors in browser console for main flows

phases.name: Reliability, Testing & Performance
phases.summary: Vitest, logging, and performance hooks in place; coverage and perf tuning pending.
tasksRemaining: Run pnpm test and fix failing tests (update mocks and handlers as needed)
Add tests for auth, upload/tracks, library, surf/social, and admin tools
Use performance helpers or tooling to benchmark surf/social/upload endpoints
Add or refine Prisma indexes and caching for slow critical endpoints

phases.name: Security & Compliance
phases.summary: Auth, CSRF, validation, and rate limiting implemented; review and hardening needed.
tasksRemaining: Confirm .env.local is git-ignored and rotate any production secrets post-testing
Document route-to-role access matrix and ensure all /api/admin/** endpoints are gated
Ensure all API inputs are validated with Zod and uploads enforce type/size limits
Review logs for security events and confirm sensitive data is not logged

phases.name: Deployment, DevOps & CI/CD
phases.summary: Health checks and observability-ready code exist; pipeline and infra to be wired.
tasksRemaining: Create/verify Dockerfile and optional docker-compose.yml for production runs
Configure CI to run lint, typecheck, test, and build on PRs and main
Set up staging and production environments with separate envs/DBs
Wire logs and metrics into chosen monitoring/alerting stack

phases.name: Media, Real-Time & Advanced Features
phases.summary: Media pipeline and advanced features are scaffolded; v1 scope must be finalized.
tasksRemaining: Run upload:default-album script and verify admin tools for metadata/waveforms
Decide which of battles, live streaming, astroVibes, wallet, marketplace ship in v1
Guard non-v1 features behind feature flags and/or role conditions
Verify Socket.io-based real-time flows (DMs/live/battles) handle auth and failures cleanly

phases.name: Docs, Support & Launch Readiness
phases.summary: Technical summaries exist; runbooks, checklists, and public notes still needed.
tasksRemaining: Extend docs with new-engineer setup guide and production runbook
Create docs/LAUNCH_CHECKLIST.md with pre-, during-, and post-launch steps
Draft public-facing release notes for users based on upgrade summaries
Document rollback procedure and test it once in staging
